name: Cryo Pod
leaveText: Better leave it alone for now...

nodes.text: This pod looks very similar to the one you woke up in.
The pod life support appears to have failed, probably due to a power shortage. Also, the poor soul inside looks oddly familiar.
The pod offers only a faint error beep in response to your button mashing.
You can't really get a proper grip on the edge of the pod. You would probably need some sort of bar type tool, preferably bent like the beak of a crow.
